website_summaries.verdict: Beautiful crystal flutes with crystal-filled stems that look much more expensive than their mid-range price would suggest.
pros: Sport a traditional shape with a twist, as the stems are filled with crystals that catch the light and sparkle
They come in a box that's worthy of gifting
cons: Some flutes arrived damaged, so you'll want to order them well in advance of your special occasion just to be safe

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful flutes!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these flutes as gift to a bride and groom. I have not used them obviously. They came well protected and in tact. The sparkle of the crystals is wonderful. The box presents very nicely as well. You can’t beat the price and will make anyone happy to receive. I am proud to give them to my friends and you will be too!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey A Bohlmann

customer_reviews.title: The days of old fashioned crystal drinkware are over!
customer_reviews.text: All around great experience! The packaging itself is so incredible that you know there must be something very special inside. The flutes are so modern and elegant. The stem and base are breathtakingly bedazzling. I am sure the couple we toasted to will cherish them and pass them on as a family heirloom.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Suzanne Ribeiro

customer_reviews.title: Wedding Day Bliss
customer_reviews.text: My original wedding champagne glasses (different company) broke when hand washing one 3 days before my wedding day! After frantically searching amazon, I found these and WOW am I glad I did! What a mixed blessing! The glasses arrived very promptly and are just simply GORGEOUS. They look very expensive and very elegant. I got compliments ALL night long!!! We hope to keep these forever. I will definitely buy Matashi again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GORGEOUS!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a wedding gift, so I can't review the durability but they are a gorgeous set of stemware, elegantly packaged and looks more expensive than what I paid for it. They are beautiful and makes the perfect gift! Would purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Delicia M.

customer_reviews.title: very pretty
customer_reviews.text: These were used as our toasting glasses at our recent wedding. Very nice. The first set arrived with a broken stem. The company quickly replaced my order. They are packed very well, though the glass is a bit thin. Not for daily use, only for special occasions.
customer_reviews.author: Happy girl

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous !!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing flutes !! Great for the money, beautiful product and fabulous gift presentation. Also, loved how elegantly it was boxed !!
customer_reviews.author: NONNA RIA

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these flutes for my wedding. I was looking for some that looked like the Swarovski ones but for a lesser price and OMG did I find them. These are so beautiful and in my opinion are just as pretty as the Swarovski ones. Although my wedding isn’t until next year I couldn’t wait to purchase once I saw them
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Worth every cent 👌🏽
customer_reviews.text: These are gorgeous. Just what I need for my Romantic dinner for two. I love them 😍. Thank you 😊
customer_reviews.author: MijnLiefde

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful glasses, arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: These were very very beautiful glasses. The couple we bought them for absolutely loved them. The first set we bought arrived broken- both stems! But Amazon was quick to send us a replacement. I would give them 5 stars if it wasn't for that!
customer_reviews.author: Emy

customer_reviews.title: Came damaged
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for a bridal shower. Unboxed and one of the stems on the flutes was broken in half, all the crystals inside the stem were everywhere. The unbroken flute was gorgeous. Cant decide if they arent packaged well enough or if they are so fragile it wouldnt matter. I would by another but it wont come in time for the shower. Trip to macys it is. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: A. Kaska

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful glasses, beautifully packaged. However, one of the glasses came in 3 pieces. Too late to return now. These are going to be used for New Year’s Eve in a few days. I guess I’ll have to get some epoxy🤔
customer_reviews.author: Nitwhits

customer_reviews.title: Received a new set of flutes no charge!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and unique set of crystal flutes. Originally ordered for my son’s wedding! Although the first delivery the stems were cracked. Received a complimentary new set and full refund! I will definitely use this seller again. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Lorie Ann

customer_reviews.title: Very good value for money
customer_reviews.text: High quality product at a very competitive price. Very good value for money. Eye-catching home decor items. Will actually use them in my coming silver wedding anniversary.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They loved it. Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my in-laws 60th anniversary and had it engraved. It turned out well. They loved it. Good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: PeanutButter

customer_reviews.title: The Bride to be loved these, and everyone else did too
customer_reviews.text: Absolutly stunning. Well packaged for protection but still beautifully presented.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous glasses
customer_reviews.text: Stunninggggggggg champagne glasses! I was very impressed with the packaging as it was for an anniversary gift. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: diva mom

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous and a bargain!
customer_reviews.text: After an extensive search for toasting flutes, I purchased these for my upcoming wedding. They are absolutely beautiful and a bargain in comparison with other stemware that I had priced.
customer_reviews.author: Tssz

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations!
customer_reviews.text: The flutes are exquisite and the packaging and presentation was as even better!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Stina Wine

customer_reviews.title: 2nd time ordering
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd time ordering this item as gift. The price and quality is excellant. Can't beat it. I have Swarovski champagne glass as well but i feel they both have the same quality but the price you cant beat. I recommend it highly.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Hong

customer_reviews.title: Very Pretty
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful and of good quality. Worth the price for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift. Presentation was perfect. Loved the box they came in. The bride to be loved them.
customer_reviews.author: nicole strout

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous flutes
customer_reviews.text: They were a gift to my daughter and she loves them. They are beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: jmreads

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Toasting Glasses!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my daughter's wedding. They are beautiful! They come in a nice box and are a perfect gift.
customer_reviews.author: Stepholais

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: These glasses a really very beautiful with the crystals in the stem and the faceted bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Dharmiac

customer_reviews.title: Well made and very presentable as a gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our 15th wedding anniversary and it is very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Soh

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very elegant and decorative champagne flutes. They are unique and, I am very happy with my purchase. Highly recommend seller
customer_reviews.author: james R. Coddington

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I gave the glasses as a gift to my sister and they are prettier than expected. Gorgeous, fancy, rich, quality. She went nuts! Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie L Phillips

customer_reviews.title: they are so beautiful, 💎 I sincerely recommend them they are very ...
customer_reviews.text: they are so beautiful, 💎 I sincerely recommend them they are very elegant so perfect💝 and they come very protected💕
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too bad I can only give 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Got these for the wife, she absolutely loves them. Very well made and classy. Too bad I can only give 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Coombe

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful champagne glasses
customer_reviews.text: Gave these as a wedding shower gift, they are a nice weight, beautiful and everyone loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Ann Hay-Wright

customer_reviews.title: They're beautiful. They are a wedding gift
customer_reviews.text: They're beautiful. They are a wedding gift. My wife always buys the kids toasting glasses for their wedding and chose these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty and very well received
customer_reviews.text: Gave these as a gift for an engagement. Very pretty and very well received. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Sarah T

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful flutes that looked even nicer in person
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful champagne flutes! I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Pincott

customer_reviews.title: Everyone loved
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful gift - they felt like royalty drinking from - crystal in stem is a great touch
customer_reviews.author: mattb

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful champagne flute
customer_reviews.text: A beautiful champagne flute. Looks even better in person as the crystal stems dazzle in the light. An excellent gift.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel R. Simpson II

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Gift Set!
customer_reviews.text: Can’t wait to give this beautiful crystal set as a wedding gift.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: They are beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a present for my niece’s wedding. They are beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: jean mcjilton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful!!!! Very well made and comes in an elegant box. Great as an engagement gift for toasting glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer
